siteMetadata.title: Quick Dev tips by Anubhav Srivastava
siteMetadata.subtitle: Personal quick tips for Web Developers

frontmatter.title: Stick your notes on any site
frontmatter.description: Take your own notes for a page of a site or anywhere on the web via Firefox Addon. The notes persist for that site for future use.

frontmatter.title: Become a better developer, one tab at a time.
frontmatter.description: Gain new developer skills every time you open a New Tab! Choose which programming languages you want to get better at in options and get smarter every time you open a New Tab. All you need is 30 seconds to read and understand snippets of code and improve your knowledge.

frontmatter.title: Starting to chalk down small tips
frontmatter.description: "A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step" is a common saying that originated from a famous Chinese proverb. So here is a dedicated place on the web to talk and chalk out some of my personal small tips for developers.
